column4: after reinstalling grub and restart... it shows this... " grub> " and the cursor only blinking

linux /vmlinuz-    and press <tab> to complete
2011-03-16T11:58:00.000Z	llutz_	YourTube	linux /vmlinuz-2.6.35-27-generic root=/dev/sda2"         <<-  make complete line read like this
either follow Jordan_Us hint or try "linux /vmlinuz-2.6.35-25 root=/dev/sda2"
better use the live-cd, no fun to estimate your kernel-version (wonder why tab-completion doesn't work)
